reviews.review: If you don't know about the game then you have lived under a rock or are too young to play it, in both cases, skip them game for the sake of the community...
Çok İyi Ve Aksiyon Dolu Bir Oyun.
Best game i have played in my life
Con sus errores y aciertos, es el juego que jugué toda mi vida y pienso seguir haciéndolo.
still the same old game we all love
Tirando o fato que o anti cheat não é dos melhores, é bom.
Good Shoot Shoot. Bad Speak Speak ruski blyat only
Da Spielt ist nice, suchtfaktor ist da
I will at least die 10 years earlier, just because of the thousands knives i didnt won but only missed by one field.
arkadaşlarınızla girdiğinizde dünyanın en eğlenceli oyunu
It's a great game with decent hit reg.  Competitive play is alright, but a decent amount are toxic and there are many hackers in silver.
Oyun gerçekten eğlenceli geliyor.Ama biraz adaletsizlik var rank dagıtımında.En önemli problem oyunda hile açan çok kişi var ve gercekten bu oyundan soğutuyor.Hilelere bir çözüm bulunmalı.
O kadar saat boş ama iyi
amazing and fun but loads off ched and ruski people
y do all russians have 25 iq
despite having so many hours i still get hackers
sim,otima qualidade e uma boa jogabilidade gostei pakas
bom jogo pena q não é bom
I played a bit would recommend
Es ist so ein tolles Spiel. Der Einstig ist zwar schwierig aber es lohnt sich.
Me like game. I play too much. No GF because game.
learned new language playing as terrorists 10/10
one of the best fps games out there and its free so that means you are able to play this game with out spending money

Симулятор жены, тоже вытягивает деньги на шмотки, как кс на скины.
